name: The Legend of Baba’Lu (alpha v0.3.3)
description:
Submitted for the horror-based 5th Annual Hawktober Game Jam

Estimated playtime: 15 minutes

Content warning: This game may contain flashing lights and disturbing content including animal cruelty and dramatized depiction of mental illness. Player discretion is advised.

Version 0.3

Baba'Lu, giver of life, master of the toxic swamp - our family made a promise for you three hundred years ago in exchange for our lives. But what future we can no longer uphold our family tradition?

Credits Programming, Background art, Character art, Font, Writing:
  • Gensun
Sound Design & Music:
  • Joel Steudler
  • Bitter Sweet Entertainment, Inc.
  • TK.Projects
  • Degica
